Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="utf-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

After the H3 has crawled the url successfully, 
I want to publish the content, title, author to the remote server, use webservice.
the remote server is a php website, will receive the xml from heritrix3, and save it to database.
How to do it?
